mapper.select: select * from t_chatinfo where ((sourceclientid=#{id1} and targetclientid=#{id2}) or (sourceclientid=#{id2} and targetclientid=#{id1})) and time between #{start} and #{end} order by time asc

SELECT trc.user_id as userId, trc.contract_user_id as contractId, tu.nick_name as nickName, last_message as lastMessage, message_time as lastMessageDate FROM `t_recent_contract` trc LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON trc.user_id=tu.id WHERE user_id = #{userid} order by message_time desc
